TYPE SPECIES:
Gabrius maritimus Motschulsky
, fixed by original designation.
— Tottenham, 1955: 181, 190 (keys to African and Oriental species).
— Lohse, 1964: 186 (characters; key to central European species).
— Coiffait, 1974: 111 (characters; key to species of western Palaearctic region).
— Drugmand 1987b (comments on distribution of Belgian species).
— M. Hansen, Kristensen, Mahler, Pedersen, 1991: 107 (list of Danish species).
— Silfverberg, 1992: 16 (list of species of Fennoscandia, Denmark , and the Baltic States).
— Smetana, 1993b: 48 (list of species of Czech Republic and Slovakia ).
— Smetana, 1995e: 478 (characters; key to North American species; notes).
— M. Hansen, Liljehult, Mahler, and Pedersen, 1995: 29 (additional records to Danish list of species).

— M. Hansen, 1996: 37, 106 (probably belongs within
Philonthus
; list of Danish species).
— Lundgren, 1998: 51 (list of species from Florida ; records for other States listed for each species).

— Newton, Thayer, Ashe, and Chandler, 2000: 396 (2 Nearctic species; notes; characters in key).
